attributes.action: urgently assist the housebuilding industry by amending the pension rules to permit the purchase of residential property directly by a Self Invested Personal Pension (SIPP)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Finance Act 2004 proposed a relaxation of the rules to allow residential property to be purchased by a SIPP. The proposal was removed by the then chancellor in the pre-budget report on 5 December 2005. 

However, if the proposal is reinstated it will free substantial sums to be invested by holders of SIPPs into the residential property market, increasing liquidity for the substantial benefit of the economy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
